data.text: @DaJabba Sorry to hear this Amit. Can you provide us with your eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@songularity We have reported to IT team. If you have further info to be provided, feel free to DM us. Thanks for bringing this to our attention. -Vinci
@songularity Can you also provide the app version and appID (i.e. setting page)? As this involves your privacy, we highly recommend you to DM us. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@songularity We still have different landing pages for homepage, please specify which country site are you in. We would appreciate if you could provide us more details such as full URL via DM so we can look into it. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@songularity Hi there, thanks for heads up. May you tell us which browser, the full URL and what device you are using via DM? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@DapperCockney You may check in 3 hours before flight departure -Elsa
@DapperCockney Hi there. May we know which airport for your departure flight referring to? - Anna

data.text: @kiwietje87 Hi Denice. Cathay Pacific confirms that no passenger flights have flown over Iran or Iraq for over a year already. There will be no Cathay Pacific flights overflying Iran and Iraq until further notice. - Anna
@Cec_and_Wine Im afraid the food menu rotate twice a month, and today Dan Dan noodle is not a the menu :( -Elsa
@Cec_and_Wine Hi Cecily, may we know have you checked with our server? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@Ceooron Sorry Dovi, Special Meals Request have to be placed at least 24 hours prior to departure. -Vinci

@RushilZutshi Please share your eTicket no and full name in DM. - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@BestTV_Shows Hi there, passport detail will be needed only after you have purchase the ticket -Elsa

@vanessa_lam Our apologies. :( May you DM us with your eTicket number, passenger name, baggage tag number / file reference and contact email so the baggage team can contact you for follow-up? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@UppalRavish Online check-in will open when both flights fall into 48 hours prior to departure. I'm afraid that it's too early for now. CX679 will depart at 2015pm from Hong Kong, we recommend you to try after 2015pm Hong Kong time tonight. If it doesn't work by that time, you can DM us. -V https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@andyeakin @British_Airways Hi Andy, mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? Thanks. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

urls.title: Online Flight Booking | Airfare | United States - Cathay Pacific
urls.description: Book flights to Hong Kong, Manila, Bangkok, Cebu, Vancouver and other destinations with Cathay Pacific. You can also manage bookings and view your frequent flyer account online.

data.text: @destineecham Please check out our fares on our website https://t.co/wa5i1xZJLr! This will be the easiest way for you to get the latest fares and make a booking.
@adam_chilli Hi Adam, you can split into 2 pieces of baggage. For more details, you may visit https://t.co/rq0ybeaYD8 - Golly
@markstubb Hi there, can you provide us with your eTicket number and passenger name in DM so we can check on this for you? - Golly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@Radika_fiji Our apologies. Mind letting us know your eTicket number, baggage tag number, full name and email address through DM so we can look into it? - Golly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@TheMid70s Hi there, well-received and we have replied your message there - Golly
@itsTRISHbetch You may send us the details through DM. Thank you. - Golly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@itsTRISHbetch Hi Trisha, we are sorry to hear your disappointment. Would you mind let us know your eTicket number, full name and email address so that we can help pass the case to the customer relationship team for follow up? - Golly
@MikeP_cgl Hi Mike, would you mind sending us your eTicket number in DM so we can check on this for you? - Golly https://t.co/6IweuRkR51

@SydAbd @cathaypacificIN Hi there. We are sorry to let you down. Please understand that it takes 7-14 business days (Mon to Fri) for Customer Relations Team to investigate the case once you submitted. Kindly allow more time at this moment. Hope for understanding. - Anna

@bdfighter2018 Hi there, you may do the online check 48 hours prior departure. Thank you! https://t.co/uQYPVQaQP4
- Liz
@AlexDevasia1 @cathaypacificIN Mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? Thanks.  - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@AlexDevasia1 @cathaypacificIN Hi there. Sure, it can be carried in cabin baggage. - Anna
@crystalgarcia Hi Crystal, would you mind to DM us your booking reference, and also send us more detail, so that we can look into it -Elsa

@lybond17 You may find their contact details below:
https://t.co/GvTEe2EZi4 - Golly
@lybond17 We only handle Cathay Pacific and Cathay Dragon enquiry in this platform. Thanks for your understanding. -Ella
@lybond17 Please approach Hong Kong Express Airways for further assistance as we are two different companies. Thanks for your understanding - Holly
@lybond17 Hi there, please approach Hong Kong Express Airways and HSBC Bank for further assistance immediately - Holly

data.text: @aditibparikh Sorry to hear this, Aditi. It's never our intention for letting you down. :( Do you mind sending us DM with the eTicket number and passenger name so we can have a look? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@swatimohan94 Sorry for the delay. Do you mind sending us DM with eTicket number and passenger name so we can look into it? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@mizuwong Thank you. To protect your privacy, you are advised to send us Direct Message and hide your personal details from public tweet. We have sent you DM and will continue to assist you there. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@mizuwong @rhexryan We take every case serious and reply to customer's feedback when we receive it. If there was no case reference, can you share your full name, flight date and itinerary and the registered email address that you have placed when you file the case online with us via Direct Message?
@mizuwong @rhexryan Would you mind to send us the case reference number in DM through the link below so we can look into it?- Golly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@mizuwong Hi Alvin, we are sorry to let you down. May we know which email address did you send to?  - Golly
@mizuwong @rhexryan We are afraid that we do not provide assist through email on our end :(  Can you please share your reference no for your complaint in DM so we can look into it? - Liz
@KingSarpa Our airport team will assist to arrange an alternate flight for her. Please kindly approach our airport staff for assistance - Chloe
